summary: Provides a collection of utilities for the GitPython test suite, including a mock process adapter that mimics subprocess behavior, a base test class with shared readâ€‘only repository access and common setup/teardown helpers, and a set of functions for creating temporary local and remote repositories, managing temporary directories, and wrapping arguments for fixtures.
business_intent: To streamline and standardize the testing of GitPython by supplying reusable test infrastructure, mock objects, and temporary repository management, thereby reducing boilerplate and ensuring consistent test environments.
